mapper.insert: insert into destination_impl(num, title, address, firstimg, mapx, mapy, mlevel, tel, type) values(destination_impl_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{address}, #{firstimg}, #{mapx}, #{mapy}, #{mlevel}, #{tel}, #{type})
mapper.select: select num, title, address, firstimg, tel from( select /*+ INDEX(destination_impl indexNum)*/ rownum rn, num, title, address, firstimg, tel from destination_impl where ROWNUM <= #{pageNum}* #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount}
